lustre/tests/small_write.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <sys/stat.h>
00037 #include <sys/types.h>
00038 #include <fcntl.h>
00039 #include <unistd.h>
00040 #include <errno.h>
00041 #include <stdlib.h>
00042 #include <string.h>
00043 
00044 #define GOTO(label, rc)   do { rc; goto label; } while (0)
00045 
00046 int main (int argc, char **argv) {
00047         int fd, i, rc = 0;
00048         unsigned long bytes, lbytes;
00049         struct stat st;
00050         char *str, *str2, *readbuf;
00051 
00052         if (argc != 3) {
00053                 fprintf(stderr, "usage: %s <filename> <bytes>\n", argv[0]);
00054                 GOTO(out, rc = 1);
00055         }
00056 
00057         bytes = strtoul(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00058         if (!bytes) {
00059                 printf("No bytes!\n");
00060                 GOTO(out, rc = 2);
00061         }
00062         if (bytes % 2) {
00063                 printf("Need an even number of bytes!\n");
00064                 GOTO(out, rc = 3);
00065         }
00066         lbytes = 3*bytes/2;
00067 
00068         str = malloc(bytes+1);
00069         if (!str) {
00070                 printf("No enough memory for %lu bytes.\n", bytes);
00071                 GOTO(out, rc = 4);
00072         }
00073         str2 = malloc(lbytes+1);
00074         if (!str2) {
00075                 printf("No enough memory for %lu bytes.\n", lbytes);
00076                 GOTO(out_str, rc = 5);
00077         }
00078         readbuf = malloc(bytes*2);
00079         if (!readbuf) {
00080                 printf("No enough memory for %lu bytes.\n", bytes*2);
00081                 GOTO(out_str2, rc = 6);
00082         }
00083 
00084         for(i=0; i < bytes; i++)
00085                 str[i] = 'a' + (i % 26);
00086         str[i] = '\0';
00087 
00088         memcpy(str2, str, bytes);
00089         memcpy(str2+(bytes/2), str, bytes);
00090         str2[lbytes] = '\0';
00091 
00092         if (bytes < 320)
00093                 printf("First  String: %s\nSecond String: %s\n", str, str2);
00094 
00095         fd = open(argv[1], O_CREAT|O_RDWR|O_TRUNC, 0700);
00096         if (fd == -1) {
00097                 printf("Could not open file %s.\n", argv[1]);
00098                 GOTO(out_readbuf, rc = 7);
00099         }
00100 
00101         rc = write(fd, str, bytes);
00102         if (rc != bytes) {
00103                 printf("Write failed!\n");
00104                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 8);
00105         }
00106 
00107         sleep(1);
00108         rc = fstat(fd, &st);
00109         if (rc < 0 || st.st_size != bytes) {
00110                 printf("bad file %lu size first write %lu != %lu: rc %d\n",
00111                        (unsigned long)st.st_ino, (unsigned long)st.st_size,
00112                        bytes, rc);
00113                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 9);
00114         }
00115 
00116         rc = lseek(fd, bytes / 2, SEEK_SET);
00117         if (rc != bytes / 2) {
00118                 printf("Seek failed!\n");
00119                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 10);
00120         }
00121 
00122         rc = write(fd, str, bytes);
00123         if (rc != bytes) {
00124                 printf("Write failed!\n");
00125                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 11);
00126         }
00127 
00128         rc = fstat(fd, &st);
00129         if (rc < 0 || st.st_size != bytes + bytes / 2) {
00130                 printf("bad file %lu size second write %lu != %lu: rc %d\n",
00131                        (unsigned long)st.st_ino, (unsigned long)st.st_size,
00132                        bytes, rc);
00133                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 12);
00134         }
00135 
00136         rc = lseek(fd, 0, SEEK_SET);
00137         if (rc != 0) {
00138                 printf("Seek failed!\n");
00139                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 13);
00140         }
00141 
00142         rc = read(fd, readbuf, bytes * 2);
00143         if (rc != lbytes) {
00144                 printf("Read %d bytes instead of %lu.\n", rc, lbytes);
00145                 if (rc == -1)
00146                         perror("");
00147                 else
00148                         printf("%s\n%s\n", readbuf, str2);
00149                 rc = fstat(fd, &st);
00150                 if (rc < 0 || st.st_size != bytes + bytes / 2) {
00151                         printf("bad file size after read %lu != %lu: rc %d\n",
00152                                (unsigned long)st.st_size, bytes + bytes / 2,
00153                                rc);
00154                         GOTO(out_fd, rc = 14);
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 15);
00158         }
00159         rc = 0;
00160 
00161         if (bytes < 320)
00162                 printf("%s\n%s\n", readbuf, str2);
00163         if (strcmp(readbuf, str2)) {
00164                 printf("No match!\n");
00165                 GOTO(out_fd, rc = 16);
00166         }
00167 
00168         printf("Pass!\n");
00169 out_fd:
00170         close(fd);
00171 out_readbuf:
00172         free(readbuf);
00173 out_str2:
00174         free(str2);
00175 out_str:
00176         free(str);
00177 out:
00178         return rc;
00179 }
